column4: Is the NVIDIA 180.xx glx  plug and play when changing between graphhics cards in the 8xxx and 9xxx series. It worked for me. Can anyone confirm?
I successfully changed to a 8500gt from a 9800gt and after a reboot it picked it up correctly. Will the clock and GPU settings be correct for older card
the clock and GPU settings are controlled in hardware, you shouldn't have anything  to worry about
I figured. Thanks for confirming. :) I appreciate it
